subsection.name: Description
subsection.div:
Checks for expired TODO comments. Actually it is a generic
pattern matcher on Java comments. To check for other patterns in Java comments, set the pattern property.

tr.td: Specify pattern to match comments against. Should contain groups date and comment

subsection.name: Notes
subsection.p: Live template example from IntelliJ IDEA. Example: //TODO $DATE$ $USER$ requires remove ISSUE-1234$END$ env: date("dd.MM.Y") user()
Using TODO comments is a great way to keep track of tasks that need to be done. Having them reported by Checkstyle makes it very hard to forget about them.

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.p: To configure the check for comments that contain TODO and FIXME, case-insensitive:

pre.code: <module name="Checker"> <module name="TreeWalker"> <module name="ExpiredTodoComment"> <property name="pattern" value= "(?i)(TODO|FIXME)\s*(?<date>\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2})\s*(?<comment>.*)"/> <property name="format" value="yyyy.dd.MM"/> </module> </module> </module>

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
